doc.field: Discussions and Essays on Health and Physical Education
Discussions and Essays on Health and Physical Education

The materials in this folder are various writings and essays penned by Susan L. Hendrick on the nature of the body, its relation to health and God, and the theories animating the Hendrick Institute's pedagogy of physiological knowledge. There are also discussions of various new exercise regimens and equipment. Throughout the manuscripts, these texts are often on the same pages as various lists of names of parents, children, and staff.
